mapper.select: select acom_image_add_name from tbl_acomo_add_img A join tbl_acomodation B on A.fk_acom_no = B.acom_no where acom_no = #{acom_no} order by acom_image_add_no

select category_fac_name from tbl_acomodation A join tbl_facilities B on A.acom_no = B.fk_acom_no join tbl_category_facilities C on B.fk_category_fac_no = C.category_fac_no where A.acom_no = #{acom_no}
select nvl(cp_name,'없음')AS cp_name,host_name,host_email,cp_reg_no from tbl_host A join tbl_acomodation B on A.host_no = B.fk_host_no where acom_no = #{acom_no}

SELECT A.review_subject as review_subject, A.review_content as review_content, A.review_score as review_score, A.review_image as review_image, A.review_reg_date as review_reg_date , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_review A JOIN tbl_room B ON A.fk_room_id = B.room_id WHERE B.fk_acom_no = #{acom_no}) AS review_cnt FROM tbl_review A JOIN tbl_room B ON A.fk_room_id = B.room_id WHERE B.fk_acom_no = #{acom_no} order by review_reg_date
select room_no,room_type ,room_image, price , room_id from tbl_room where fk_acom_no = #{acom_no} order by room_no
